content:
Yes, extracurricular activities are offered in universities in Bacolod. Most of the universities in Bacolod offer a wide range of extracurricular activities that cater to students' interests, such as sports, arts, music, and cultural clubs. These activities provide students with opportunities to explore and enrich their talents and skills outside of the classroom. 

In addition to these traditional extracurricular activities, many universities in Bacolod also offer community service programs, social and cultural events, and volunteer opportunities. These activities help students develop social skills, leadership qualities, and a sense of community involvement. 

Overall, there are many opportunities for students to engage in extracurricular activities in Bacolod, enhancing their university experience and personal growth.
